keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Kaku Battle Causes Destabilization
keyEvents.description: The intense battle between Zoro and Kaku causes the Tower of Justice to destabilize and begin sliding.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the destructive power of their clash and the literal shaking of the World Government's foundations.

keyEvents.title: Franky Reaches Luffy's Battle
keyEvents.description: Franky arrives at the location where Luffy is fighting Rob Lucci within the Tower.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the delegation of Robin's rescue to Franky.

description: The central tower of Enies Lobby where the CP9 members battle the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Robin and Spandam Arrive at the Bridge
keyEvents.description: Spandam successfully drags Robin to the Bridge of Hesitation, where they see the Gates of Justice standing open.
keyEvents.significance: Critical location where Robin is brought dangerously close to being taken away forever.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Escape Attempt
keyEvents.description: Robin headbutts Spandam and attempts to escape on the bridge but is recaptured.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Robin's desperate will to live and return to her friends.

keyEvents.title: Spandam's Cruel Taunting
keyEvents.description: Spandam kicks and taunts Robin on the bridge, revealing his cruel nature.
keyEvents.significance: Heightens the emotional stakes of Robin's rescue.

description: A long bridge connecting Enies Lobby to the Gates of Justice. Named for the hesitation criminals feel before being taken through the gates to their fate.

reveals.information: The Bridge of Hesitation debuts in this episode as the path between Enies Lobby and the Gates of Justice

keyEvents.title: Gates Seen Open from Bridge
keyEvents.description: Robin and Spandam see the Gates of Justice standing wide open from the Bridge of Hesitation.
keyEvents.significance: Visual representation of Robin's impending fate if not rescued.

description: Massive gates that lead from Enies Lobby to the World Government's judicial system. Criminals taken through these gates are never seen again.
